title: SNL50: Watch All the Highlights From the Star-Studded Anniversary Special (Updating Live)
description: Saturday Night Live is celebrating a milestone birthday… and a whole bunch of big names are showing up for the party. In honor of the sketch comedy institution’s 50th season, NBC is airing a live, three-hour event on Sunday — titled SNL50: The Anniversary Special — with dozens of cast members, hosts and musical guests from decades past […]
author: Dave Nemetz
excerpt: 'SNL' is throwing a star-studded bash for its 50th birthday! Follow along as TVLine live-blogs all the best moments from Sunday's anniversary special.
text: SNL50: Watch All the Highlights From the Star-Studded Anniversary Special (Updating Live)Saturday Night Live is celebrating a milestone birthday… and a whole bunch of big names are showing up for the party. In honor of the sketch comedy institution’s 50th season, NBC is airing a live, three-hour event on Sunday — titled SNL50: The Anniversary Special — with dozens of cast members, hosts and musical guests from decades past returning to Studio 8H for a night of comedy, music and mayhem. You want to see SNL alums? Everyone from Chevy Chase and Jane Curtin to Adam Sandler and Chris Rock to Amy Poehler and Will Ferrell to Andy Samberg and Kristen Wiig are back to relive their glory days. How about A-list hosts? The special is bringing back luminaries like Tom Hanks, Steve Martin, Robert De Niro and Scarlett Johansson. And musical guests will be represented, too, both classic (Paul McCartney and Paul Simon) and modern (Bad Bunny and Sabrina Carpenter). Of course, the celebration is bound to feature plenty of nods to SNL’s storied past with revivals of beloved sketches and characters — along with more than a few surprises. Throughout the evening, TVLine will be live-blogging the festivities and rounding up all of the highlights from SNL50 special below, for your viewing enjoyment. Scroll down to see the top moments — we’ll update this post as the show airs (beginning at 8/7c on NBC and Peacock) and as video becomes available — and join us down in the comments to discuss it all. Stay tuned… SNL Weekend Update: The 25 Best Characters
html:
SNL50: Watch All the Highlights From the Star-Studded Anniversary Special (Updating Live)

Saturday Night Live is celebrating a milestone birthday… and a whole bunch of big names are showing up for the party.

In honor of the sketch comedy institution’s 50th season, NBC is airing a live, three-hour event on Sunday — titled SNL50: The Anniversary Special — with dozens of cast members, hosts and musical guests from decades past returning to Studio 8H for a night of comedy, music and mayhem.

You want to see SNL alums? Everyone from Chevy Chase and Jane Curtin to Adam Sandler and Chris Rock to Amy Poehler and Will Ferrell to Andy Samberg and Kristen Wiig are back to relive their glory days. How about A-list hosts? The special is bringing back luminaries like Tom Hanks, Steve Martin, Robert De Niro and Scarlett Johansson. And musical guests will be represented, too, both classic (Paul McCartney and Paul Simon) and modern (Bad Bunny and Sabrina Carpenter).

Of course, the celebration is bound to feature plenty of nods to SNL’s storied past with revivals of beloved sketches and characters — along with more than a few surprises. Throughout the evening, TVLine will be live-blogging the festivities and rounding up all of the highlights from SNL50 special below, for your viewing enjoyment. Scroll down to see the top moments — we’ll update this post as the show airs (beginning at 8/7c on NBC and Peacock) and as video becomes available — and join us down in the comments to discuss it all.

Stay tuned…

SNL Weekend Update: The 25 Best Characters
